content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option >huomaathan että suomenkielinen ohje on toistaiseksi alkuperäinen vuonna 2013 julkaistu versio ja siinä on vain yksi koko enlanninkielisessä uudistetussa ohjeessa on kolme kokoa kujeillen fingerless mitts were originally designed for an lys called lankakauppa kuje the revised and extended version of the original pattern first published in 2013 was uploaded in february 2022 **pattern features ** english version - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminoloy - mirrored cable charts for the right and left mitt - three sizes small 48 sts in the wrist and 52 sts in the hand medium 52 sts in the wrist and 56 sts in the hand and large 56 sts in the wrist and 60 sts in the hand - charts but no written instructions for the cable pattern - instructions for working the nupps in an easy way - pattern tech edited by helena kahan 1 https //payhip com/b/nbxgq
